snippet: Nikos Michaloliakos, the leader of the Golden Dawn party, was ordered held pending trial on charges of setting up a criminal organization.
abstract: Nikos Michaloliakos, leader of Greece's far-right Golden Dawn party, is ordered to be held pending his trial on charges of setting up a criminal organization; arrest is part of government’s crackdown on party described by Greek and European authorities as neo-Nazi and violent.
lead_paragraph: Nikos Michaloliakos, the leader of the Golden Dawn party, was ordered held pending trial on charges of setting up a criminal organization.

headline.main: Party Leader in Greece Is Returned to Custody
headline.print_headline: Party Leader In Greece Is Returned To Custody
